args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Headlight Low Beams May Fail/FMVSS 108

International Motors, LLC (International) is recalling certain 2025 IC Bus CECB buses equipped with halogen headlights.  When the high beams are activated, the low beams turn off.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) number 108, "Lamps, Reflective Devices, and Associated Equipment."Headlight low beam failure can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 5.0"
